name: The Last Scholar (zabzuro)
description:
The Last Scholar How long can you last when you're surrounded by demons.

Collect and read books to gain wisdom.

Be careful, every book you collect will add weight and slow you down.

Read books to shed weight and earn wisdom as a reward.

Remember, the higher your wisdom the stronger you are.

Your enemies are getting stronger over time, the only chance against them is to increase your wisdom.

How to play

WASD - Movement

Spacebar - Read books to gain wisdom

Mouse - Aim and fire
